description: This file is the main entry point of a Vue.js application, setting up the app instance, installing plugins like Pinia and router, and mounting the app to the DOM.

methods.name: createApp
methods.description: Initializes the Vue application with the root component App.

methods.name: createPinia
methods.description: Creates a Pinia store instance for state management.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Registers plugins (Pinia and router) with the Vue app.

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue app to the DOM element with id 'app'.
